channel.title: GWD Team
channel.description:
Looking for a good GWD team to get some decent kills today. Prices are high for the new items atm. Pretty much the only way to get a spot is to crash. If interested post below or add me on RS.
RSN: F X X

@Decimus wrote:

Garb sells for 25M if any1 gets one

item.title: GWD Team
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:9, topic:458620”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=561529.msg4097502#msg4097502 date=1347034718]

Boots bought in g.e for me for 11.5m, gloves 4.2m (800k below mid) hoods still buying put an offer in for 5.5m. Out of subjection I think the only thing that sells for above market is the boots tbh, since you can wear gano theirs not really a need for the other 2 parts in post pvm situations. The body could be nice with elite void though.
I heard the drop rates got nerfed so hopefully the items will retain a decent value. Probably not though;c

People always say the drop rates get nerfed when new items are released. It’s never true, though.
[/quote]
Actually they were.

"Why do some minions such as ZGWD & SGWD have better drop rates than their main bosses? This is only making people kill the minions and ignoring the main bosses by walking under them.

Mod Hunter: Because of having many more drops on the individual drop tables, some of the minions ended up having drop rates higher than intended. These have now been corrected and should be similar to what they previously were. "

RuneScape

Recent Game Updates - RuneScape Forum

Recent Game Updates - Discuss the latest content additions and changes to the game

That’s massively lame. If it weren’t for the source, I would have trouble believing it. If you think about it logically, they could have figured out the drop rates for each item for each monster and mathematically analyzed them. It’s one thing to make a mistake, but this is a massive logic error on the part of whomever programmed it.

Read full topic

item.title: GWD Team
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:8, topic:458620”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=561529.msg4097308#msg4097308 date=1347003700]
Boots bought in g.e for me for 11.5m, gloves 4.2m (800k below mid) hoods still buying put an offer in for 5.5m. Out of subjection I think the only thing that sells for above market is the boots tbh, since you can wear gano theirs not really a need for the other 2 parts in post pvm situations. The body could be nice with elite void though.
I heard the drop rates got nerfed so hopefully the items will retain a decent value. Probably not though;c
[/quote]

People always say the drop rates get nerfed when new items are released. It’s never true, though. :P[/quote]
Actually they were.

"Why do some minions such as ZGWD & SGWD have better drop rates than their main bosses? This is only making people kill the minions and ignoring the main bosses by walking under them.

Mod Hunter: Because of having many more drops on the individual drop tables, some of the minions ended up having drop rates higher than intended. These have now been corrected and should be similar to what they previously were. "

RuneScape

Join the discussion on the official RuneScape forum. Share your thoughts with the community, ask questions, find help, learn about events and much more.

item.title: GWD Team
item.dc:creator: @Decimus Decimus
item.description:
@Decimus wrote:

After playing for a good amount of time yesterday, I realized the best profit as of right now is to kill zammy minions or any minion in that case. What we would do is COINSHARE the drops that way we wont have difficulty selling items dropped such as subjection robes.
